list.description:
Deprecated - Pending successor
October 23 2025

I can't do this, I'm sorry. I just cannot get myself to open this game again, I've been enjoying everything else far too much. Back then I had a reason to keep it maintained as I originally made this set of sights for my own enjoyment, but now that I no longer play the game, I don't have any motivation to work on this. You can find all of the files I was working with on this git repository: https://github.com/Hookens/HKSights

This includes the few presets I put together.

As the license states, you are free to reuse e...

#БМД_4
#bmd_4
прицел для БМД - 4
Изменил перекрестие по сравнению с другими моими прицелами на более удобное для автопушек.
Для какой машины ещё сделать и предложения по улучшению пишите в комментариях

#Т_62М1
#t_62m1
Прицел для Т-62М1.
Дальномер на возле центральной линии настроен на среднюю ширину и длину танков;
Баллистика 3БМ28 и 3БМ21 почти не отличается так, что можно использовать и для 3БМ21;
При смене типа снаряда линия возле надписи с названием снаряда перемещается.
#universal #all_tanks #anime #vermeil

Система управления огнём «Риска»
Минималистичный прицел с графическим дальномером подходящий для всех типов техники.

Особенности:

  • Подписи к рискам поправки дальности перемещены на центральную шкалу.
  • До 2 километров рисуются риски по 200 метров, далее по 400 метров до 6 километров.
  • Индикатор значения введённой поправки отключён.
  • Добавлена дальномерная шкала для цели высотой 2.7 метра на дистанцию в 400, 600, 800, 1000 и 1200 метров.

Использование:

  1. Совместить контур цели с подходящей по высоте р...

#anime #all_tanks

Hello, welcome back. Today, we're making a different stuff. If you want to know, I am a fan of historical sights, and seeing that an entire line of tanks in the British Tech Tree, with their utterly unique designs, is devoid of any sights. Thus, I work with my friends on making this happen. Introducing die Suid Afrikaanse Sightpack.

All of these sights are ported on @RideR2's legendary sightpacks, and help from my friends on Discord in researching and cataloguing South African vehicle specs, and their sights. Thus, I would like to extend my thanks on them.

And finally, I want you to go ...

#anime #lycorisrecoil #all_tanks #sight
Universial sight for Lycoris Recoil : Takina Inoue

a simple sight for this seasons Lycoris Recoil. Contains a lazer rangefinding version.

...

POV: You went around the wrong corner.

This sight is really impractical and I wouldn't recommend using it in battle.

#sherman #firefly #sherman_firefly

Now with this incredible new gunsight you can have Neptune constantly laughing at your horrible aim every time you miss by 83 lightyears like every other Tiger player.

Btw if you want you can send me a picture and I can try to turn it into a sight, as long as it is something easy-ish to trace.

Edit: I recently made a remake of this sight that's better than this version (In my opinion), here's the link: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1055432/en/

Historical sight BPK-1-42(BMP-2)

#bmp_2 #bmp2 #historical

This sight is based on one made by @_JollyRogers_ (https://live.warthunder.com/post/842781/en/)
It will work on any light/medium/heavy tank, but was initially designed for and works best with the Object 906
I've changed the sight illumination color to green and changed the range tickmarks (now goes to 3800m, and has more fine intermediate tickmarks)
I've also taken the stadiametric rangefinder from a sight @Ometius93 created and added it here (https://live.warthunder.com/post/673486/en/)
The rangefinder is based on a 2.4m tall tank i.e t-54/55 so if you see a taller tank (M60, T34, etc.)...
Changed it up a bit to fit what i prefer. Warfare 2077 inspired sight. Original sight: https://live.warthunder.com/post/971241/en/
